name: Black Ops - Elite Sniper Assassin Edition
name_original: Black Ops - Elite Sniper Assassin Edition
description:
It’s time to take out those terrorists in an action packed modern military campaign ops.

Choose from several different guns including machine-guns sniper rifles and grendades.and fend off your position on the battlefield for as long as you can.

Withstand waves of snipers, assassins and heavy gunners as you combat the enemy. Stand with honor as you confront the enemy combatants in guerrilla warfare.

Can you outlast the enemy through all three war zones?

Features
- Several different weapons
- Realistic 3D graphics
- In-game weapon upgrades
- Incredible grenade explosions
